snippet.title: Quest For Glory 1 - VGA - Promotional Trailer (1992)
snippet.description: Here is a rare promotional trailer (actually released as a "non-playable demo" back in 1992) for the classic game, Quest For Glory 1: So You Want To Be A Hero by Lori and Corey Cole for Sierra On-Line. This trailer boasts the new 256-color VGA version with hand-painted digitized graphics and full Stereo sound. This is a true example of the golden age of computer gaming when adventure games were true works of art.
